definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
relay baton/(fig.) responsibilities (passed over to one's successor)
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
practice in which a novice monk is shouted at or hit with a stick with the purpose of bringing about instant awakening (Buddhism)/to rebuke sternly

sentences.english: Sinatra always made it all about him, and this is maybe his best-ever performance.
sentences.chinese: 辛納屈一貫地全力以赴，而這次是他史上最棒的演出。

sentences.english: The linear rods are supported by engineered polymer plastic bushings.
sentences.chinese: 線性棒支持的聚合物塑料套管。

sentences.english: It could be the name of a lolly , or a game.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是一種棒糖或是一種遊戲的名字。

sentences.english: Finishing strong is one of the best feelings in racing.
sentences.chinese: 一個有力的撞線是比賽中最棒的感覺之一。

sentences.english: The dog's way of celebrating was to eat part of the pregnancy test kit.
sentences.chinese: 馬利喫掉了一部分驗孕棒來表達它對此事的慶祝。

sentences.english: I think my mother is a good housewife.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我媽媽是一個非常棒的家庭主婦。

sentences.english: Resistance temperature sensor makes temperature setting more accurate, safe and hygienic.
sentences.chinese: 電阻式測溫棒使溫度設定更精準，更安全衛生。

sentences.english: Change the Zink block of cathodic Protection.
The bridge construction of the multiple leg Elements is unique.
sentences.chinese: 連橋結構是這種多段型棒固有的特性。

sentences.english: Parting involves cutting off the part from the main bar stock.
sentences.chinese: 切斷指從棒形主材上切下工件。

sentences.english: The carrot, of carrot-and-stick fame, is not as effective as we've been led to believe.
sentences.chinese: 蘿蔔加大棒中的蘿蔔並沒有我們相信的那麼有效。

sentences.english: Qomolangma started with Gyigyi as the first bearer and Wang Yongfeng the second.
sentences.chinese: 此後，王勇峯隊長擔任第二棒火炬手。

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運會境內第一棒火炬手劉翔跑過天安門廣場。

sentences.english: I think we're so good that we'll be asked to play in the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我們如此棒，以致於會被邀請去奧運會打比賽。

sentences.english: He likes to drink, have a good time, and tell everyone how wonderful he is.
sentences.chinese: 他開懷暢飲，歡度每一刻，告訴每個人他有多棒。

sentences.english: At first sight intrapreneurship looks like an excellent idea.
sentences.chinese: 乍一看，大企業家精神像是個非常棒的概念。

definition: first-rate/excellent (loanword from Japanese 一番, ichiban)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
see 沒說的|没说的[mei2 shuo1 de5]
good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
(neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
